amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to transfer or divest AH-64 Apache helicopters from the Army National Guard to the active Army prior to June 30, 2016 and to strike the proviso regarding enforcement of section 8116.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to transfer or divest AH-64 Apache helicopters from the Army National Guard to the active Army prior to June 30, 2016 and to strike the proviso regarding enforcement of section 8116.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rothfus amendment (A030) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rothfus amendment (A030) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Rothfus.
